text: "The Pilot" is the first single from Double Experience's third studio album Rock (Geology), officially released on November 14, 2017. ==Background== On October 5, 2017, Double Experience's official Facebook page announced their new single and its release date. The band later announced a launch party in Ottawa to celebrate the song's release. ==Music video== Double Experience released a music video for "The Pilot" on November 9, 2017. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" ! Country ! Date ! Format ! Label |- ! scope="row"| Global | November 14, 2018 | Digital download | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Double Experience songs
title: The Pilot (Double Experience song)
